lines.text: Hey! Get out the mother fuckin' pacer now! Get out now! Move! Or I'll be lookin' at five eyes instead of four! Get out! Now! And gimme your wallet! Give it to me now!
You know what? You are one geeky-looking mother fucker!

[referring to Charlie to his friend]
Es un dickwad, que no?

[on the radio]
This is K-WAD Radio. KWAD Los Angeles. Well, it's a real hoo-yah Friday; a real scorcher out there. If you're on that 110 Freeway headin' north, well, heck, it's a parking lot! If your boss gave you the day off or you're on your way home to see that little wife, take those surface streets and have a good day! Now, back to some cool tunes.
